join.name: Name
join.pleaseAgree: Please agree to the terms for signup.
join.agreeAll: Agree to all terms and conditions
join.agreeToAge: [Required] Agree to Terms of Use for users aged 14 and above
join.agreeToPersonalInfo: [Required] Agree to Collection and Use of Personal Information View

agreeToFinForU.title:
[Required]  
Agree to FinForU
agreeToFinForU.content:
Article 1 (Purpose)  
The purpose of these terms is to define the conditions and procedures for using the service (hereinafter referred to as the “Service”), as well as the rights, obligations, and responsibilities of members and the operator.


Article 2 (Membership Registration and Formation of Service Contract)  
Membership registration is completed upon agreeing to these terms and submitting an application. The service contract is established when the service approves the applicant’s use of the service.


Article 3 (Service Content)  
The service provides the following:

* Financial guides
* Bank locations
* Financial product recommendations
* Exchange rate inquiry
* Deposit/savings and card management


Article 4 (Member Obligations)

* Members must not misuse others' information.
* Members must not post false or inappropriate content.
* Members must not interfere with the smooth operation of the service.


Article 5 (Termination of Contract and Use Restriction)  
Members may withdraw at any time, and service use may be restricted in case of terms violation.

agreeToAge.title:
[Required]  
Agree to Terms of Use for users aged 14 and above
agreeToAge.content:
The Service does not collect personal information from children under the age of 14, and use of the Service by users below that age is restricted.  

Members confirm and agree that they are 14 years of age or older.

agreeToPersonalInfo.title:
[Required]  
Agree to Collection and Use of Personal Information View
agreeToPersonalInfo.content:
FinForU collects and uses the following personal information:  
1. Collection ItemsMandatory: Name, Email, Password, Visa Type, Visa Expiration Date, Nationality, Preferred Financial Products
2. Purpose of UseTo provide financial services
3. Retention and Use PeriodThe information is retained until the member withdraws, and thereafter it is promptly destroyed.  

※ For more details, please refer to the [Privacy Policy].

If you want, this can be further customized or formalized for legal clarity.

agreeToPromotionNoti.title:
[Optional]  
Agree to Receive Promotional Notifications
agreeToPromotionNoti.content:
I agree to receive marketing information such as events, discounts, and new product announcements via SMS, email, or app push notifications.  
These marketing communications may include various benefits, coupons, and promotional notices.  
You can still use the service without agreeing, and you may withdraw your consent at any time after giving it.

agreeToMarketingNoti.title:
[Optional]  
Agree to Receive Marketing Notifications
agreeToMarketingNoti.content:
I agree to receive marketing information such as new product announcements, user reviews, customer surveys, and promotions from the company (service/platform) and its partners via SMS, email, app push notifications, and other channels.  
Marketing information includes various events, surveys, and service improvement announcements.  
Consent is optional, and service use is available regardless of consent. Consent status can be changed at any time.

wallet.deleteMsg:
Are you sure you want to delete?

settings.loginToSee: More features are available after login.
settings.deleteDesc: When you delete your FinForU account,
settings.1desc: All your personal information, login details, usage records, reviews, and content you have created will be permanently deleted and cannot be restored.
settings.2desc: Once the deletion is complete, you will no longer be able to use the service or log in with that account.
settings.3desc: Please make sure to save or back up any important information before deleting your account.
settings.deleteMsg: Do you really want to delete your account?
settings.completeDelete: Your account has been successfully deleted.
